name: INTERSTELLAR STRUGGLE
description:
You have been put in charge of a planet.

Your task is to protect this planet against attacks from neighbouring planets. 

Due to malfunctioning communications you cannot warn neighbouring planets for loose projectiles. So, every projectile that does go out of bounds, is seen as an act of war!

PLAY!
Because of the scoreboard system, this game is hosted on my own website. The source-code is oploaded on this itch page :-)
Play here (original submission): https://wouter52.com/PROJECTS/VJ03_INTERSTELLAR_STRUGGLE

=============================================

Theme: Turn up the heat
Everytime a projectile goes out of bounds, a neighbouring planet will see this as an act of war and will fire their own projectiles. The war gets hotter and hotter!

Focus: multi-use
Your shield also acts like the base for the weapon. A hole in your defense means a place you can't use your missile. Which makes the game even harder.

Credits:
Graphics: all made by myself.
Sounds: all generated with: https://sfxr.me/
